go_data.justification: FADD interacts with the death domain of Fas and initiates apoptosis through signal transduction.
FADD is recruited to the death-inducing signaling complex to initiate cell death.
FADD interacts with the death domain of Fas and other proteins like TRADD and RIP to initiate signal transduction.
FADD initiates apoptosis through its interaction with the death domain of Fas.
